MC_SOURCE (ENUM)
MC_SOURCE (ENUM)
Â¶
TYPE MC_SOURCE :
Determines the source or reference used for position, velocity,
acceleration, or jerk.
Attributes:
qualified_only
InOut:
Name
Comment
SAVE
Use the values computed on the PLC, as a reference.
(Based on the start of a PLC cycle.)
SET
Use the values computed on the PLC, as a reference.
(Based on the end of a PLC cycle.)
ACT
Use the actual values in the drive as a reference.

rows.Name: SAVE
